heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

Act 2000 (Exempted Development) (No. 3) Regulations 2023. 

(2) The collective citation “Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 

2023” includes these Regulations.

title: following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 3. Article 5(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
3. Article 5(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following definitions after the definition of “fish counter”: 

“‘gas pressure regulating station’, means a unit station comprised of 
equipment, the purpose of which is to hold pressure constant or to vary it in a 
pre-determined manner; 

‘gas vent stack’, means a device designed to vent gas in the event of over 
pressure being detected within the system it protects;”. 

Amendment of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 3 article 5(1) principal regulation amended inserting following definition definition fish counter gas pressure regulating station mean unit station comprised equipment purpose hold pressure constant vary pre-determined manner gas vent stack mean device designed vent gas event pressure detected within system protects  amendment part 1 schedule 2 principal regulation

title: following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 1. The volume above ground level
text_raw:
1. The volume above ground level 
of any gas pressure regulating 
station, and ancillary equipment, 
shall not exceed 9 cubic metres, 
measured externally.

title: following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Planning and Development Regulations 2001, as 
amended (the Principal Regulations). 

Article 3 of these Regulations amends Article 5 of the Principal Regulations by 
inserting a new definition for “gas vent stack” and “gas pressure regulating 
station”. 

Article 4 of these Regulations amends Part 1 (Exempted Development – 
General) of Schedule 2 to the Principal Regulations by inserting a new Class 
29C of exemptions from the requirement to obtain planning permission for 
certain works undertaken by a statutory undertaker authorised to provide a gas 
service.
